statements: SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, country_of_origin FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_of_measurement FROM ingredients WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE unit_of_measurement IN ('lbs', 'oz');
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC, country_of_origin DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ingredient_name, country_of_origin FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy' AND unit_of_measurement = 'kg' ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT ingredient_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ingredients GROUP BY ingredient_name HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT ingredient_name, country_of_origin FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE '%salt%'
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT name, country_of_origin FROM ingredients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM ingredients ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, cuisine_type, preparation_time FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT id, name, preparation_time FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time < 30;
SELECT name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy';
SELECT id, name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Indian' AND preparation_time < 60;
SELECT name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, country_of_origin, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 AND country_of_origin != 'USA';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT name, price FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT name, address, email, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, quantity, price FROM ingredients WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' AND difficulty_level = 'Easy'
SELECT name, address, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE name LIKE '%Food%'
SELECT id, name, origin_country FROM ingredients WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY origin_country ASC, id DESC
SELECT id, name, difficulty_level FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level IN ('Easy', 'Medium')
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT id, name, origin_country FROM ingredients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_category, preparation_time FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time > 30;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City';
SELECT inventory_id, ingredient_id, supplier_id, purchase_date FROM ingredient_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE origin_country='Italy';
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_category FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time > 30;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location='California';
SELECT ingredient_id, supplier_id, quantity FROM ingredient_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, quantity, unit FROM ingredients WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy';
SELECT name, description FROM recipes WHERE cuisine = 'Chinese';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 10.00 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, total_cost, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE country_of_origin='Italy';
SELECT name, quantity, unit FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT suppliers.name, inventory.price, inventory.quantity FROM suppliers JOIN inventory ON suppliers.id = inventory.supplier_id WHERE inventory.price < 10 ORDER BY suppliers.name ASC;

SELECT recipes.name, recipes.cuisine, ingredients.name AS ingredient_name, inventory.quantity AS available_quantity FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.id = ingredients.id JOIN inventory ON ingredients.id = inventory.ingredient_id ORDER BY recipes.cuisine DESC, available_quantity ASC;

SELECT orders.id, suppliers.name AS supplier_name, orders.total_cost, orders.status FROM orders JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.id WHERE orders.total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY orders.total_cost DESC;
